quest.name: Heavenly Power
journal:
The red uma yoriki has a clear, present, and progressive need for a horsey advocate.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

The red uma yoriki would shout of the power of the horse from the rooftops. Don the uma kabuto and speak with the yoriki's vassal, the red uma doshin, at the Red Rooster Stead in lower La Noscea.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
You have found the doshin unmanned, unhorsed, and unaccented. As the sole wearer of the kabuto, it now falls to you to collect the carrots in the farm.
You have collected the carrots. With your kabuto on, give them to the Stead botanist.

Impressed by your strength, the botanist has asked you to try using your equine-like muscles to bring him an enormous carrot that was left in the field. Let your mane fly in the wind as you hunt for it around the Stead.
You have found the enormous carrot. See it delivered to the botanist, who will readily recognize you with the kabuto on.

Pleased by your delivery of the giant carrot, the botanist has declared himself convinced of the horse's magnificent power. Give the happy news to the doshin, keeping the proud visage of the horse gracefully atop your head.
The doshin praises you through his own pain. Deliver the carrot, the token of your success, to the red uma yoriki in Limsa Lominsa.

The yoriki lauds your achievement and rewards you with a crimson uma kabuto. Tales of the horse's prowess should spread on the next market day. Would that it were so in Gridania and Ul'dah! Offer yourself wherever you are needed, then let the uma bugyo be the final arbiter of your success.
objectives: While wearing the kabuto, speak with the red uma doshin at the Red Rooster Stead.
While wearing the kabuto, collect carrots.
While wearing the kabuto, hand the carrots to the Stead botanist.
While wearing the kabuto, collect the enormous carrot.
While wearing the kabuto, hand the enormous carrot to the Stead botanist.
While wearing the kabuto, report to the red uma doshin.
Deliver the carrot to the red uma yoriki in Limsa Lominsa.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: M'ladyM'lord knows the role we play in this enterprise, I am hoping.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: Rescuers, m'ladym'lord, rescuers. Fair Eorzea, fettered in feathers, shackled to shame. It is sad, no? So on horseback we are riding, to the rescue!

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: I am liking Eorzea. The sights, the food, the people...but not the horsebirds, no. Wretched, kweh-ing things. We of the East must be saving Eorzeans from wretched mounts.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: I am talking of boyish things. M'ladyM'lord will pardon, yes? Let us speak now of your task.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: The harvest, it proceeds at the Red Rooster Stead. They are needing a nice strong horse, but do they know it? No, m'ladym'lord.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: I am thinking, perfect! What chance to show the strength of the horse. I am having a nice cob on the Stead already; you are to help him carry the harvest. Go, go.

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> ...Come to relieve me? Oh, thank the Twelve. Blasted yoriki and his ideas! He's a northeasterner, you know. They're all off their gourd.

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: <groan> I put my back out! But no matter, we're to transport the harvest from the Stead─some proof of a horse's power.

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: My back went before I actually collected the vegetables or loaded the wagon. The harvest's still scattered hither and yon.

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: Gather up the harvest and hand it to a farmer, won't you? Then you can hitch yourself to the wagon and show all that “horse-power” the yoriki blathers on about.

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: Ow...owww! If I call you m'ladym'lord, will you put that kabuto on?

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: (-Red Uma Doshin-)Hold up, you're here to be the horse. Put your uma kabuto on first.

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: Good gods, another one of those horse mummers. We can't all be having fun 'n' games during the harvest, ye know.

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: What's this? Hauled me some carrots, did ye? Well, that's a useful sort of a mummer now. Not like the last one─man couldn't lift a twig.

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: Got a strong back there, do ye? Powerful sort of shoulders? A mummer could make herselfhimself even more useful and carry the giant carrot left there by the field.

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: Don't see no horse helm on ye, girlboy. If yer just passing through, then keep on passing. We've vegetables to harvest.

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: Well? Hefted the giant carrot, or didn't ye?

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: Oho! Really put yer back into this one, eh, lassiefella?

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: That oughta do her, at least for this harvest. Don't need ye anymore. All I got to do is to hitch this wagon to a chocobo, and...

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: What? You want to pull the wagon instead?

dialogue.name: FARMER
dialogue.text: That's my kind of crazy talk. I appreciate that, but no thanks. Believe you would pull the cart, though! Horses are that strong, eh? Or at least you are.

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: Ungh... Ah, m'ladym'lord, you're back. Hm? He said what? “Horses are that strong”?

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: Well, there's our task done and nobody had to hitch themselves to a wagon. I call that a win!

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: You make a fine horse, m'ladym'lord. A sight better than me. Why, if I really were a horse, I'd be for the knacker now.

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: You've more than earned this carrot. Give it to that beast from the northeast, and my message too...

dialogue.name: SUBORDINATEC
dialogue.text: “I am thinking the Red Rooster Stead is won, amazing show of horsepower.” Full stop and...owww.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: A good result you are having down at the Red Rooster Stead? Tell me, m'ladym'lord.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: Oh, the doshin's carrot. His back, he is throwing out? Some poultice I am sending, then.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: The vegetables are reaching Limsa Lominsa, but do you know what else, m'ladym'lord? The reputation. Horses, Lominsans are hearing, horses are strong.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: Now you are taking this crimson kabuto, for all your pains. The doshin? M'ladyM'lord is kind to be remembering him, but a poultice he is already getting.

dialogue.name: REDGENERAL
dialogue.text: The rescue of Eorzea is almost done! I am thinking how pleasant it is to be having a Lominsan lamprey pie now. M'ladyM'lord forgives the notion? M'ladyM'lord has more work to do, and only then is shehe visiting the uma bugyo in Gridania.
